title: 3/Bed 2/Bath Rent-2-Own Home in Wagy
posting_body: Wide open space with a lovely 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home in Commerce City!
Well cared for home with an open floor plan and lots of natural light throughout.
The primary bedroom has an updated 5-piece private bath.
Enjoy the large family room perfect for entertaining or relaxing curled up with a good book.
This is not just the regular for-rent option.
This is a Rent-2-Own program and here are the requirements:
No felony conviction in the past 6 years
No eviction in the past 5 years
Move-in date of 45 days after you get qualified
Copy and Paste this link to chat with us and see other Rent-2-Own options: https://m.me/MoxieEXP?ref=DENRent2Own
Listing by: Tyler Shields of Keller Williams Realty Success
Written permission from Listing agent to post this home on Craigslist
